content:
Hello FHIR Community,
Hope you're all well, I am new to this chat group , I need help getting started , I know what FHIR overall is but I am finding difficulty learning the practicals of it and understanding codebases with FHIR integration. Can anyone point me in the right direction and help me with some tutorials or HowTos etc.
thanks!.

I need to understand the code base to make a PR , I was just looking for someone to point me in the right direction , and connect me with the resources to learn from. I have an urgent need for fhir integration into an app architecture, all the tutorials on youtube seem to be descriptive in nature.

What are you wanting to make a PR against? There are a variety of code bases for different languages. There are streams specific to each reference implementation - as well as detailed documentation for each reference implementation. There are typically also recorded tutorials that explain the use of the RIs.
